name: awesome-claude-skills
description: A curated marketplace of practical Claude Skills for enhancing productivity across Claude.ai, Claude Code, and the Claude API

plugins.name: brand-guidelines
plugins.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to artifacts for consistent visual identity and professional design standards.

plugins.name: competitive-ads-extractor
plugins.description: Extracts and analyzes competitors' ads from ad libraries to understand messaging and creative approaches that resonate.

plugins.name: domain-name-brainstormer
plugins.description: Generates creative domain name ideas and checks availability across multiple TLDs including .com, .io, .dev, and .ai extensions.

plugins.name: internal-comms
plugins.description: Helps write internal communications including 3P updates, company newsletters, FAQs, status reports, and project updates using company-specific formats.

plugins.name: lead-research-assistant
plugins.description: Identifies and qualifies high-quality leads by analyzing your product, searching for target companies, and providing actionable outreach strategies.

plugins.name: content-research-writer
plugins.description: Assists in writing high-quality content by conducting research, adding citations, improving hooks, and providing section-by-section feedback.

plugins.name: meeting-insights-analyzer
plugins.description: Analyzes meeting transcripts to uncover behavioral patterns including conflict avoidance, speaking ratios, filler words, and leadership style.

plugins.name: twitter-algorithm-optimizer
plugins.description: Analyze and optimize tweets for maximum reach using Twitter's open-source algorithm insights. Rewrite and edit tweets to improve engagement and visibility.

plugins.name: canvas-design
plugins.description: Creates beautiful visual art in PNG and PDF documents using design philosophy and aesthetic principles for posters, designs, and static pieces.

plugins.name: image-enhancer
plugins.description: Improves image and screenshot quality by enhancing resolution, sharpness, and clarity for professional presentations and documentation.

plugins.name: slack-gif-creator
plugins.description: Creates animated GIFs optimized for Slack with validators for size constraints and composable animation primitives.

plugins.name: theme-factory
plugins.description: Applies professional font and color themes to artifacts including slides, docs, reports, and HTML landing pages with 10 pre-set themes.

plugins.name: video-downloader
plugins.description: Downloads videos from YouTube and other platforms for offline viewing, editing, or archival with support for various formats and quality options.

plugins.name: algorithmic-art
plugins.description: Creates algorithmic art and generative designs using computational creativity techniques.

plugins.name: artifacts-builder
plugins.description: Builds elaborate, multi-component Claude.ai HTML artifacts using modern frontend technologies including React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

plugins.name: changelog-generator
plugins.description: Automatically creates user-facing changelogs from git commits by analyzing history and transforming technical commits into customer-friendly release notes.

plugins.name: developer-growth-analysis
plugins.description: Analyzes your recent Claude Code chat history to identify coding patterns, development gaps, and areas for improvement, curates relevant learning resources from HackerNews, and automatically sends a personalized growth report to your Slack DMs.

plugins.name: mcp-builder
plugins.description: Guides creation of high-quality MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers for integrating external APIs and services with LLMs using Python or TypeScript.

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Provides guidance for creating effective Claude Skills that extend capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, and tool integrations.

plugins.name: webapp-testing
plugins.description: Tests local web applications using Playwright for verifying frontend functionality, debugging UI behavior, and capturing screenshots.

plugins.name: template-skill
plugins.description: A template skill that demonstrates the structure and format for creating new Claude Skills.

plugins.name: file-organizer
plugins.description: Intelligently organizes files and folders by understanding context, finding duplicates, and suggesting better organizational structures.

plugins.name: invoice-organizer
plugins.description: Automatically organizes invoices and receipts for tax preparation by reading files, extracting information, and renaming consistently.

plugins.name: raffle-winner-picker
plugins.description: Randomly selects winners from lists, spreadsheets, or Google Sheets for giveaways and contests with cryptographically secure randomness.

plugins.name: tailored-resume-generator
plugins.description: Analyzes job descriptions and generates tailored resumes that highlight relevant experience, skills, and achievements to maximize interview chances.

plugins.name: document-skills-docx
plugins.description: Skills for working with Microsoft Word documents including creation, editing, and formatting using DOCX format.

plugins.name: document-skills-pdf
plugins.description: Skills for working with PDF documents including creation, editing, forms, and advanced PDF operations.

plugins.name: document-skills-pptx
plugins.description: Skills for working with PowerPoint presentations including creation, editing, and formatting using PPTX format.

plugins.name: document-skills-xlsx
plugins.description: Skills for working with Excel spreadsheets including creation, editing, formulas, and data manipulation.
